Tom Misch

Recent News

Typically known for his fusion of jazz, soul, funk, and hip hop, Tom Misch is shifting gears this year on his brand new project, Supershy, releasing a slew of electronic tracks under a fresh alias. Having already dropped two new tracks earlier this year alongside the announcement of the new moniker, Misch is now readying up to release two more this coming Thursday. In April, the singer took to Instagram to share the cover art for his first new music under the alias. “I present to you Supershy,” he announced.
